title: Person 2 Person Delivery (P2P)
description: Whether you need to send your father’s reading glasses or surprise your mom with a handwoven shawl, we’ll make sure everything moves with flexibility, speed, and accuracy.

title: Merchant Delivery Service
description: We understand the hustle you go through while building your business, we empathise with the nervousness of your very first-order. We are here as your partner with the flexibility to deliver things wherever and whenever you require.

title: Air Parcel
description: When things can’t wait to be sent the next day or the coming week, and you desperately want to send or receive something that very day, we are here for you as we understand the anticipation and urgency.
